attributes.title: Delete this app from the app store
attributes.review: This app made my phone start glitching. Ever since I downloaded it nothing has been able to load. The second I deleted it everything was back to normal again. There are some MAJOR technical issues with this app. I recommend apple to take down this app from the app store so that no one else has the issues I experienced.
